title: Youth book printed 2011, headline and numbers similiar to the stop-font
content:
Hello friendly font-specialists,

I am looking for the name of this font. It is printed in a youth game-book. The topic are computers and hackers. I tried Identifont and WTF but I could not find the right one. The Stop-font was pretty close but not an exact match. The book is printed in Germany in the year 2011.

Please excuse the bad picture I can try to take another one if the quality is to bad to identify it.

[![Bild hochladen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235im_/http:/www11.pic-upload.de/thumb/17.06.14/kgoqav1zinbp.png)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235/http:/www.pic-upload.de/view-23579884/fontid.png.html)

[![Bild hochladen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235im_/http:/www11.pic-upload.de/thumb/17.06.14/tclru3y1z8qh.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235/http:/www.pic-upload.de/view-23581245/10422421_812777048734728_6227998616913938149_n.jpg.html)

Thank you in advance.

Best regards  
Palme
author: Palme

comments.content: A better image could help (bigger and cleaner).

Perhaps a Sonic [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/") could be edited to make the letters.  
Don

As Don said **[Sonic Cut Thru Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725034235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/)** is a good option. Probably with a white outline to make it a bit thinner...
